descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57640-1-1409325153.png[/img]

[center]Maiden Raven for unpb-bbp
 
Mod required - XPMS
 
 
New types human witches who are yet to be fully transformed into hagraven will be added.
They will drop hargraven clothes that player can wear.
 
This mod was designed with the main purpose of adding new clothes, 
so the npcs are just  new monsters who cannot be added as a companion.
Therefore the looks are little bit altered, but the textures are nothing special.
The textures of the npcs will depend on the textures you have installed hence the
actual looks may differ from the screenshot.
 
I have used the combination of Fairskin Complexion and SG texture packs.
 
Special thanks to , 123ter, jameahn, gwangdoll, brown_fox, ara0194 for the character customization.




I'm Korean so I can't speak English. SO please do not request anything or ask something to me[/center]
author: huelparas
